name: game
description: ``` javascript let onestroke = new OneStroke( 	{ 		// 默认的线段颜色与端点颜色 		lineColor: 0xe2e2e2,  		vertexColor: 0x6dc6c0,  		strokeColor: 0x416275,  		activeVertexColor: 0x6dc6c0,  		levels: [ 			{ 				name: "第一关",  				lineColor: 0xe2e2e2,  				vertexColor: 0x90b34f,  				strokeColor: 0x445624,  				activeVertexColor: 0x90b34f,  				lines: [ 					{"x1": 375, "y1": 366, "x2": 200, "y2": 916}, 					{"x1": 200, "y1": 916, "x2": 664, "y2": 576},  					{"x1": 664, "y1": 576, "x2": 88, "y2": 576},  					{"x1": 88, "y1": 576, "x2": 556, "y2": 916},  					{"x1": 556, "y1": 916, "x2": 375, "y2": 366} 				] 			} 		] 	} ); ```
